name: Flight Rising Festival Reminder
description: This adds a little reminder to the home page that contains the dates and times for upcoming or ongoing Flight Festivals and Microholidays. I have to manually update the text, so check back for updates often or make sure that Stylus has auto update on. Tested with chrome & firefox, your mileage with other browsers may vary. Animated screenshot. See additional info for changelog etc.
additional_info: I am currently planning to keep this updated for the forseeable future. If something changes, I'll be sure to announce it on this page. As of Oct. 28, 2018 I've decided to include commented out code with inline comments that will allow you to easily manually update the reminder in the case that I am unable to continue updating or if you would rather do it yourself. See the code for detailed info about manual updates. How it works: • I'll update with the start dates (& any applicable starting time if it's not rollover) of each festival as soon as it's officially announced. When a festival isn't taking place, the Flight Festival reminder will have a picture of Joxar. • When a festival is ongoing, Joxar's picture will be replaced with the picture of the deity that matches the ongoing festival, and the start/end dates for the festival will be in the reminder so that you don't have to scroll through the announcement post to find the start and end dates/times. • NotN start/end dates will take the place of the Flight Festival reminder during December. • Due to automatic updates of styles being infrequent and because I have to manually update the text, it's unlikely that the style will update exactly at the start/end times of festivals. Sorry! Use Stylus instead of Stylish to manage your userstyles. (explanation why) Compatability: ✔ Flight Rising Global Fixes ✔ FR Compact FAQ • Q: How does this work?  A: I used pseudo elements! There is nothing fancy involved, just use of a feature of CSS to add   some (helpful) decoration. :) • Q: What's the date formatting for this extension?  A: I chose to not include year unless necessary, and all dates will be formated by short month with day, e.x. Oct. 12 or Feb. 3. I used to use MM-DD(-YY if necessary) as I am from the US, but I know that most of the rest of the world uses DD-MM-YY so I changed to a different format that I figured everybody could be happy with. ~~~ 2020 Changelog: (to see the full changelog for all years, click here) • June 28 - 8th annual Brightshine Jubilee ended today. Added start date for 8th Thundercrack Carnivale. • June 21 - 8th annual Brightshine Jubilee starts today. • June 16 - Small update for end of Sunparched Prowl. Apologies for the lack of update when it started, but at least it was hard to miss the dates with the front page news... lol. • June 1 - 7th annual Greenskeeper Gathering ended yesterday. Added start date for 8th Brightshine and reminder about 7th Anniversary • May 24 - 7th annual Greenskeeper Gathering begins today. • May 3 - 7th annual Wavecrest Saturnalia ended today. Added start date of 7th annual Greenskeeper Gathering. • April 26 - 7th annual Wavecrest Saturnalia begins today. • March 30 - 7th annual Mistral Jamboree ended yesterday. Added start date of 7th annual Wavecrest Saturnalia. • March 22 - 7th annual Mistral Jamboree started today. • March 16 - Springswarm microholiday ended today. • March 12 - Springswarm microholiday started today. • March 7 - Added start date & likely end date of Springswarm microholiday. • March 1 - 7th annual Trickmurk Circus Ended today. Added start date of next Mistral Jamboree. Sorry for the lack of update during Trickmurk Circus, IRL stuff impeded my ability to be on the computer. • February 6 - Crystalline Gala ended on the 2nd, sorry for late update. Also added start date of Trickmurk Circus. • January 26 - Crystalline Gala started today. • January 5 - Added start date for Crystalline Gala. • January 7 - The 6th Annual NotN ended today.
